explains: adv. 下坡；向下；每况愈下
wordGroup: go downhill 衰退；变坏；走下坡路

sentences.en: Their marriage went downhill after the first child was born.
sentences.cn: 自第一个孩子出生后他们的婚姻便开始走下坡路了。

sentences.en: On the descents, cyclists spin past cars, freewheeling downhill at tremendous speed.
sentences.cn: 在下坡道上，自行车手们飞快地掠过汽车，靠惯性极速冲下山去。

sentences.en: He headed downhill toward the river.
sentences.cn: 他朝山脚下的小河走去。
